* R HP:Healthy MV:Fresh > A Caved-in Passage
The small opening in the vegetation is only eight feet in diameter, and has
recently caved in so that it is now visible from the outside. A layer of
solid sand covers the surface, and with the outside light filtering in,
plants are now starting to grow here.
[ obvious exits: E ]
The corpse of a blighted deer is lying here.
A green woodpecker is here flying around.
Orasel Daeyl, Shienaran Lancer. is standing here, riding a warhorse.
Saif Sayeed is standing here, riding a warhorse.
Eyes keen, a Domani razor stands here swishing its tail, being ridden by you.

* R HP:Wounded MV:Fresh > l
A Caved-in Passage
The small opening in the vegetation is only eight feet in diameter, and has
recently caved in so that it is now visible from the outside. A layer of
solid sand covers the surface, and with the outside light filtering in,
plants are now starting to grow here.
[ obvious exits: E ]
The corpse of Buntaro is lying here.
The corpse of Groth is lying here.
The corpse of Nexen is lying here.
The corpse of Bastige is lying here.
A water skin made from dried human flesh lies here. [2]
A pile of copper pennies lies here.
A small thin vial has been left here.
Boots made from the fur of various animals have been left here.
A brightly polished set of riveted chainmail leggings lies here.
A thin belt with a beautifully carved buckle of white stone lies here.
Colored tassels flutter atop a wicked, long-hafted spear jammed into the ground.
A steel bracer lies here, glinting dully. [2]
A solid set of leather gauntlets rests here.
A pair of black vambraces lies here, gleaming brightly
A pile of dirt brown cloth has been discarded here.
A dark shirt of metal serpentine scale lies here gleaming.
A gold chain lies here in a shimmering coil. [2]
A slightly dented rimmed round helmet has been left here.
Glittering with gemstones, a golden ivy-carved ring lies here. [2]
A fine-grained oilstone lies upon the ground.
The corpse of a ramshorned trolloc is lying here.
The corpse of Haznak is lying here.
Trik al'Karst, Student of War is standing here, riding a warhorse.
Naerin the Tower Accepted is standing here.
A black shadow stallion paws the ground here, fiery-red eyes shining with evil.
Orasel Daeyl, Shienaran Lancer. is standing here, riding a warhorse.
Saif Sayeed is standing here, riding a warhorse.
Eyes keen, a Domani razor stands here swishing its tail, being ridden by you.
